post.summary: CreateTrustRegistry creates a new trust registry.

UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

authority.title: authority is the group account on whose behalf this message is executed

operator.title: operator is the account authorized by the authority to run this Msg

id.title: id is the trust registry id (mandatory)

doc_language.title: doc_language is the language tag (RFC1766) of the document (mandatory)

doc_url.title: doc_url is the URL where the document is published (mandatory)

doc_digest_sri.title: doc_digest_sri is the digest SRI of the document (mandatory)

verana.tr.v1.MsgAddGovernanceFrameworkDo.title:
MsgAddGovernanceFrameworkDocument defines the Msg/AddGovernanceFrameworkDocument request type.
[MOD-TR-MSG-2] Add Governance Framework Document

verana.tr.v1.MsgAddGovernanceFrameworkDo.description: MsgAddGovernanceFrameworkDocumentResponse defines the Msg/AddGovernanceFrameworkDocument response type.

authority.title: authority is the group account on whose behalf this message is executed

operator.title: operator is the account authorized by the authority to run this Msg

id.title: id is the trust registry id (mandatory)

archive.title: archive is true to archive, false to unarchive (mandatory)

verana.tr.v1.MsgArchiveTrustRegistry.title:
MsgArchiveTrustRegistry defines the Msg/ArchiveTrustRegistry request type.
[MOD-TR-MSG-5] Archive Trust Registry

verana.tr.v1.MsgArchiveTrustRegistryResp.description: MsgArchiveTrustRegistryResponse defines the Msg/ArchiveTrustRegistry response type.

authority.title: authority is the group account on whose behalf this message is executed

operator.title: operator is the account authorized by the authority to run this Msg

did.title: did is the DID of the ecosystem creating this trust registry (mandatory)

aka.title: aka is an optional additional URI of this trust registry

language.title: language is the primary language tag (RFC1766) of this trust registry (mandatory)

doc_url.title: doc_url is the URL where the governance framework document is published (mandatory)

doc_digest_sri.title: doc_digest_sri is the SRI digest of the governance framework document (mandatory)

verana.tr.v1.MsgCreateTrustRegistry.title:
MsgCreateTrustRegistry defines the Msg/CreateTrustRegistry request type.
[MOD-TR-MSG-1] Create New Trust Registry

verana.tr.v1.MsgCreateTrustRegistryRespo.description: MsgCreateTrustRegistryResponse defines the Msg/CreateTrustRegistry response type.

authority.title: authority is the group account on whose behalf this message is executed

operator.title: operator is the account authorized by the authority to run this Msg

id.title: id is the trust registry id (mandatory)

verana.tr.v1.MsgIncreaseActiveGovernance.title:
MsgIncreaseActiveGovernanceFrameworkVersion defines the Msg/IncreaseActiveGovernanceFrameworkVersion request type.
[MOD-TR-MSG-3] Increase Active Governance Framework Version

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description:
params defines the module parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

verana.tr.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

verana.tr.v1.MsgUpdateParamsResponse.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

authority.title: authority is the group account on whose behalf this message is executed

operator.title: operator is the account authorized by the authority to run this Msg

id.title: id is the trust registry id (mandatory)

did.title: did is the DID of the trust registry (mandatory)

aka.title: aka is an optional additional URI of this trust registry

verana.tr.v1.MsgUpdateTrustRegistry.title:
MsgUpdateTrustRegistry defines the Msg/UpdateTrustRegistry request type.
[MOD-TR-MSG-4] Update Trust Registry

verana.tr.v1.MsgUpdateTrustRegistryRespo.description: MsgUpdateTrustRegistryResponse defines the Msg/UpdateTrustRegistry response type.

verana.tr.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.
